#1      [       open        ] #1 > #2         |<?php
#2     *[         c         ] #2 > #2         |$mystring[0];
#3     *[         c         ] #3 > #3         |$mystring[5];
#4     *[        c,c        ] #4 > #4         |$mystring{0};
#5     *[       c,c,c       ] #5 > #5         |$mystring{5};
#6      [                   ] #6 > #6         |
